title: Taming
description: I can only run from my past for so long. Eventually my Demons always find me.Unfortunately, that Demon has hired three insufferable dragon shifters to bring me back to him.I just have to hide my secrets a little longer. I just have to pretend to help these assholes find the person they’re looking for without letting them know the truth.They’re on the hunt for a dangerous Mage.Just wait until they find out the Mage they’re hunting is actually me...This is a Reverse Harem series containing M/M themes. Recommended for readers 18 and over.
author: A.K. Koonce
